page.title: 08LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Trafford will not have a new {hospital}of its own.This means that the money which could have been spent on the new hospital is now going to be spent on extending{Wythenshawe hospital in Manchester. Many children living in Hale, Altrincham and Bowdon take part in annual festivals.Included in the{festivals}are processions ,music ,dancing and people generally enjoying themselves. In the year 1988 Trafford has planned to merge the Boy's and Girl's {Grammar Schools}in Altrincham.They are both to be sited at the Boy's Grammar School because at the Girl's Grammar School there are three buildings and the playing fields are quite a distance away.The proposed school will have only one main building and close by there are fields for sports.
